  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Set the first connected player as the currPlayer and his status as MY_TURN Set the Game Status as PLAYING

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Fill the board if necessary Set the currPlayer status as NOT_MY_TURN (if still connected) set the currPlayer on the next connected player If the currPlayer were the last of the player list, check if the game is over If the game is not over yet set the currPlayer status as MY_TURN
